metadata.title: CVE-2019-15651 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: wolfSSL 4.1.0 has a one-byte heap-based buffer over-read inDecodeCertExtensions in wolfcrypt/src/asn.c because reading the ASN_BOOLEANbyte is mishandled for a crafted DER certificate in GetLength_ex.

criterions.comment: wolfssl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
